Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to us, but its potential and utility resonate even more strongly with you, given its worth of $1,000,000 to you personally. We understand the significance of this product in your endeavors and are eager to facilitate its acquisition.

We are offering you the chance to own this product at a special price tailored to reflect its importance to you. Our proposed price is $950,000. This offer includes all the features and benefits that come with the product, ensuring it meets your highest expectations.

Please consider this offer carefully. We believe it represents an exceptional value proposition that respects both the product's worth and your financial considerations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
